DESCRIPTION: Add a role to a roleset.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}rolesetadd [Name] [@Role | Role ID | Role Name]** ~ Adds a role to an existing roleset.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: The roleset that you are trying to add the role to must already have been created with the {{prefix}}rolesetcreate command.
INVALID_NAME: No roleset was found with the name {{name}} on this server. To add a role to a roleset, you must  first create a roleset with the **rolesetcreate** command.
ADDED: The role has been added to the roleset.
